category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface.
contents: Frank Green Coffee Lovers Set for each team member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention.
contents: Keychron K1 Wireless Keyboard for each team member

category.title: Social Impact Prize
category.description: The best idea that addresses an issue in your local community.
contents: Crumpler Communal Dwelling Bag for each team member

category.title: First Timers Prize
category.description: The best project created by first-time hackathon participants.
category.subtext: To be eligible, at least 50% of your team must have not attended a hackathon.
contents: Bose Soundlink Micro Bluetooth Speakers for each team member

category.title: Most Entertaining Pitch
category.description: Can you summarise your pitch in in three minutes - whilst also being engaging and entertaining?
contents: Ostritch Pillow for each team member
LAMY Swift Rollerball pen with Studio Milligram Notebook for each team member

category.title: People's Choice Award
category.description: The project that wins the hearts and votes of the people.
contents: Amazon Echo smart speaker for each team member
Desktop vacuum cleaner for each team member

category.title: Best Social Media Prize
category.description: Send out the best tweet, message, photo, story or short video that sums up your experience of #UNIHACK2024.

category.title: Best Meme
category.description: Make the best meme during the event and post it on the UNIHACK Discord. I couldn't make it any more obvious.

sponsor.title: Most Healthy Hack
sponsor.description: We're looking for something that helps people live a healthier life. It could help people be more in control of their health. Or it could be something that improves the health systems around them.

sponsor.title: Best Use Case of Redactive AI
sponsor.description: We are looking for the best AI use case that builds on top of Redactive. We are a developer platform that helps connect permissioned data to AI applications. You don't need to spend time creating connections to external data sources or setup vector databases. Using our API developers can quickly get started making AI applications and be confident that sensitive data isn't leaked using our permissions platform.
